entry.def: A two-pronged or three-pronged attack, plan, or approach has two or three parts.

example.tran: 应对经济衰退的“两步走”解决方案

example.ex: The bank has a three-pronged strategy for recovery.
example.tran: 银行有一套三管齐下的复苏战略。

means.word_mean: 1. having prongs or tines; usually used in combination;
2. resembling a fork; divided or separated into two branches;

sentences.sentence: "long branched hairs on its legson which pollen collects"
